creator: Chess & Checkers Games
descriptionHtml:
Dear Player,

Do you remember this board game from your childhood?


Checkers – a traditional and inspiring game which gives you a lot of fun challenging the computer or playing with another person on a two player offline mode. Relax with your family or friends and play Checkers. Share the game with children and show them the best entertainment from your school years.

Are you a board-game-enthusiast? Would you like to create or think of a strategy to win? Checkers will help you learn and practice logical thinking. You can change settings and choose your own rules e.g. to capture backwards or to choose mandatory capture.

And what's more, you can get this app and play for free.

Checkers is a classic board game, but in this app you can find features which make the game even more exciting.

Different levels of difficulty


Let's start from the easiest level and check if you can defeat the computer. The more experienced you are, the more likely you are to win with an expert. Take up the challenge and go through all 4 levels!

Different draughts variants and rules


There is not one and only way to play Checkers. Everyone has various habits and usually prefers to play exactly the same way as in the past, that is why decide on your favourite rules:

🌍 International Draughts Capturing is mandatory and all the pieces can capture backwards. Also, the queen moves differently. It has long moves which means that, if the square is not blocked, the queen can move any distance diagonally.

🇪🇸 Spanish Draughts (Damas) It is based on the international rules, but the pieces cannot capture backwards.;

🇬🇧 English Draughts (American Checkers) Capturing is mandatory, but the pieces cannot capture backwards. The Queen doesn't have long moves, and it only has one step. The queen has the ability to move and capture backwards.

or 🇹🇷 Turkish Draughts (Dama) Dark as well as light squares of the checker board are used. Pieces start on the second and third rows, they do not move diagonally but forward and sideways. The way that the queens move are similar to the chess queens.

Have you found the best rules for yourself? If not, choose your own rules. It's really easy, just enter Settings (in the upper right corner) and choose the options that you prefer.

Play as you like


You can choose from 4 levels and play with a computer, or select two players mode and play Checkers with friends or family.

Play Checkers for free


Our Draughts are completely FREE of charge! There is also no need to be On-line to use our app.

Have a good game!

Best regards,
Chess & Checkers Team

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DraughtsForAndroid/
descriptionShort: Do you remember Draughts (Checkers)? ⛃ Best game from your childhood, play now!

Dear Player,

Do you remember this board game from your childhood?


Checkers - traditional and inspiring game gives you a lot of fun with challenging computer or playing with other person on mode 2 players offline. Relax with yor family or friends and play Checkers. Share the game with children and show them the best entertainment from your schoolyears.

Are you a board-game-enthusiast? Would you like to create or think over a strategy to win? Checkers will help you to learn and practice logical thinking. You can change settings and choose your own rules i.e. to capture backwards or to choose mandatory capture.

Checkers is the classic board game but in this app you can find features which make the game even more exciting.

Different levels of difficulty


Let's start from the easiest level and check if you can defeat the computer. The more experienced you are, the more likely to win with the expert. Take up the challenge and go through all 4 levels!

Different rules


There is no one and only way to play Checkers. Everyone has various habits and usually prefers to play exactly the same way as in the past, that is why decide on your favourite rules:

American Checkers (English Draughts) 🇺🇸

Capturing is mandatory but the pieces cannot capture backwards. The Queen doesn't have long moves but only one step. The queen has ability to move and capture backwards.

International Checkers 🌍

Capturing is mandatory and all the pieces can capture backwards. Also the queen moves differently, it has long moves – it means that the queen can move any distance diagonally if the square is not blocked.

Spanish Checkers (Damas) 🇪🇸

These rules are based on the international but the piece cannot capture backwards;

Turkish Checkers (Dama) 🇹🇷

Dark as well as light squares of the board are used. Pieces start on the second and third rows, do not move diagonally but forward and sideways. The way that queens move are similar to the chess queen.

Have you found the best rules for you? If not, choose your own rules. It's really easy, just enter Settings (upper right corner) and choose the options that you prefer.

Do you want to help us improve Checkers?
We would be grateful if you fill out a short questionnaire (3 questions). This will let us know what new features do you need.
https://forms.gle/nsP6LMeGDJxJZuhd9

I wish you had a good game!

Best regards,
Łukasz Oktaba - author

Relax and play Draughts with your family or friends. Share Draughts with kids and show them the best entertainment from your school years.

Are you a board game enthusiast? Would you like to create or think of a strategy to win? Draughts or Checkers will help you to learn and practice logical thinking. You can change game settings and choose your own Draughts app rules e.g. to capture backwards or to choose mandatory capture.

And what's more, you can download Draughts for free.

Draughts (Checkers) is a classic board game and in this app you can find features which make the game even more exciting.

Draughts with levels: 4 different levels of difficulty


Let's start from the easiest level and check if you can win vs the computer. The more experienced you are, the more likely you are to beat our Draughts expert Jennifer. Take up the Draughts challenge and go through all 4 levels!

Different Draughts variants and rules


There is not one and only way to play Draughts (Checkers). Everyone has various habits and usually prefers to play exactly the same way as used to play Draughts in the past, that is why decide on your favourite rules of this game:

English Draughts 🇺🇸 or American Checkers 🇬🇧

Capturing is mandatory, but the pieces cannot capture backwards. The king doesn't have long moves, and it can only move one square. The king has the ability to move and capture backwards.

International Draughts 🌍

Capturing is mandatory and all the pieces can capture backwards. Also, the queen (king) moves differently. It has long moves which means that, if the square is not blocked, the queen can move any distance diagonally.

Spanish Draughts: Damas 🇪🇸

Known as Spanish Checkers, based on the international rules, but the pieces cannot capture backwards.

Turkish Draughts: Dama 🇹🇷

Named also Turkish Checkers. Dark as well as light squares of the checkers board are used. Pieces start on the second and third rows of a game board, they do not move diagonally but forward and sideways. The way that the kings (queens) move are similar to the chess queens.

Play Draughts and Checkers the way you like the most


Have you found the best Draughts rules for yourself? If not, choose your own rules. It's really easy, just enter Settings and choose the options that you prefer, i.e. mandatory capture, flying kings.

You can choose any of 4 levels and play vs computer or select 2 players mode offline and play Draughts with friends or family.

Play Draughts for free


Our Draughts are completely FREE of charge! There is also no need to be online to use our app.

Have a good game!

Best regards,
Chess & Checkers Team

title: Draughts

descriptionHtml:
Dear Player!

Do you remember this board game from your childhood?


Checkers – a traditional and inspiring board game which gives you a lot of fun challenging the computer or playing with a friend on two players offline mode. Relax and play Checkers with your family or friends. Share Checkers with kids and show them the best entertainment from your school years.

Are you a board game enthusiast? Would you like to create or think of a strategy to win? Checkers will help you to learn and practice logical thinking. You can change game settings and choose your own Checkers app rules e.g. to capture backwards or to choose mandatory capture.

And what's more, you can download Checkers for free.

Checkers, also known as Draughts is a classic board game and in this app you can find features which make the game even more exciting.

Checkers with levels: 5 different levels of difficulty


Let's start from the easiest level and check if you can win vs the computer. The more experienced you are, the more likely you are to beat our Checkers Master. Take up the Checkers challenge and go through all 5 levels!

Different Checkers variants and rules


There is not one and only way to play Checkers. Everyone has various habits and usually prefers to play exactly the same way as used to play Checkers in the past, that is why decide on your favourite rules of this game:

American Checkers 🇺🇸 or English Draughts 🇬🇧

Capturing is mandatory, but the pieces cannot capture backwards. The king doesn't have long moves, and it can only move one square. The king has the ability to move and capture backwards.

International Checkers 🌍

Capturing is mandatory and all the pieces can capture backwards. Also, the queen (king) moves differently. It has long moves which means that, if the square is not blocked, the queen can move any distance diagonally.

Spanish Checkers: Damas 🇪🇸

It is based on the international rules, but the pieces cannot capture backwards.

Turkish Checkers: Dama 🇹🇷

Dark as well as light squares of the checkers board are used. Pieces start on the second and third rows of a game board, they do not move diagonally but forward and sideways. The way that the kings (queens) move are similar to the chess queens.

Play Checkers the way you like the most


Have you found the best Checkers rules for yourself? If not, choose your own rules. It's really easy, just enter Settings and choose the options that you prefer, i.e. mandatory capture, flying kings.

You can choose any of 5 levels and play vs computer or select 2 players mode offline and play Checkers with friends or family.

Play Checkers for free


Our Checkers are completely FREE of charge! There is also no need to be online to use our app.


Have a good game!

descriptionHtml:

Checkers (Draughts) – a traditional and inspiring board game which gives you a lot of fun challenging the computer, playing online multiplayer mode with people from all around the world 🌍 or with a friend offline. 🧑‍🤝‍🧑 Relax and enjoy Checkers Online wherever you are. Share Checkers with kids and show them the best entertainment from your school days.

Are you a board game enthusiast? Would you like to create or think of a strategy to win? Checkers or Draughts will help you to learn and practice logical thinking. 🧠 Multiplayer checkers mode will make the game even more fun! 🎇

With our app you can:
👉 Play Checkers for free
👉Challenge yourself to 5 different difficulty levels
👉 Enjoy Checkers Online with multiplayer mode and play against random players according to the rules you like the most!
👉 Play Checkers offline with friends and family
👉 Use Hints and Undo moves
👉 Choose from a variety of boards and piece styles
👉 Personalise your user profile in Checkers online

Checkers Online no registration


Play Checkers Online with other users in just three steps:
1. Create a profile by choosing an avatar, flag of your country and entering your nickname.
2. Choose the rules you want to play.
3. Start playing and enjoy the Checkers Game.
Compare yourself to other users in multiplayer mode, improve your skills and collect gold! 💰


5 different levels of difficulty


Let's start from the easiest level and check if you can win against the computer. The more experienced you are, the more likely you are to beat our Checkers Master. Take up the Checkers challenge and go through all 5 levels! 🏆

Turkish Checkers: Dama 🇹🇷

Named also Turkish Draughts. Dark as well as light squares of the checkerboard are used. Pieces start on the second and third rows of a game board, they do not move diagonally but forward and sideways. The way that the kings (queens) move is similar to the chess queens.

Play Checkers and Draughts the way you like the most


You can change game settings and choose your own Checkers app rules e.g. to capture backward or to choose mandatory capture.

Play checkers online, offline with friends or face 5 levels of the game against the computer.
Have a good game!
Best regards,

👉 Choose from a variety of boards and piece styles
👉 Personalise your user profile in Checkers online

Checkers Online no registration


Play Checkers Online with other users in just three steps:
1. Create a profile by choosing an avatar, flag of your country and entering your nickname.
2. Choose the rules you want to play.

Compare yourself to other users in multiplayer mode, improve your skills and collect gold! 💰


5 different levels of difficulty


Let's start from the easiest level and check if you can win against the computer. The more experienced you are, the more likely you are to beat our Checkers Master. Take up the Checkers challenge and go through all 5 levels! 🏆

Checkers or Draughts variants and rules: online multiplayer and offline mode


There are many ways to play Checkers (Draughts). Everyone has various habits and usually prefers to play exactly the same way as used to play Checkers in the past, that is why decide on your favorite rules of this game:

American Checkers 🇺🇸 or English Draughts 🇬🇧

Capturing is mandatory, but the pieces cannot capture backward. The king can only move one square and can move and capture backward.

International Draughts 🌍

Capturing is mandatory and all the pieces can capture backward. The queen (king) has long moves which means that, if the square is not blocked, the queen can move any distance diagonally.

Spanish Checkers: Damas 🇪🇸

Known as Spanish Draughts, based on the international rules, but the pieces cannot capture backward.

Turkish Checkers: Dama 🇹🇷

Named also Turkish Draughts. Dark as well as light squares of the checkerboard are used. Pieces start on the second and third rows of a game board, they do not move diagonally but forward and sideways. The way that the kings (queens) move is similar to the chess queens.

Play Checkers and Draughts the way you like the most


You can change game settings and choose your own Checkers app rules e.g. to capture backward or to choose mandatory capture.

Play checkers online, offline with friends or face 5 levels of the game against the computer.

5 different levels of difficulty


Let's start from the easiest level and check if you can win against the computer. The more experienced you are, the more likely you are to beat our Draughts Master. Take up the Draughts challenge and go through all 5 levels! 🏆

Draughts or Checkers variants and rules: online multiplayer and offline mode


There are many ways to play Draughts (Checkers). Everyone has various habits and usually prefers to play exactly the same way as used to play Draughts in the past, that is why decide on your favourite rules of this game:



English Draughts or American Checkers🇺🇸 or 🇬🇧

Capturing is mandatory, but the pieces cannot capture backwards. The king can only move one square and can move and capture backwards.

International Draughts 🌍

Capturing is mandatory and all the pieces can capture backwards. The queen (king) has long moves which means that, if the square is not blocked, the queen can move any distance diagonally.

Spanish Draughts: Damas 🇪🇸

Known as Spanish Checkers, based on the international rules, but the pieces cannot capture backwards.

Turkish Draughts: Dama 🇹🇷

Named also Turkish Checkers. Dark as well as light squares of the checkerboard are used. Pieces start on the second and third rows of a game board, they do not move diagonally but forward and sideways. The way that the kings (queens) move is similar to the chess queens.

Play Draughts and Checkers the way you like the most


You can change game settings and choose your own Draughts app rules e.g. to capture backwards or to choose mandatory capture.

Play Draughts online, offline with friends or face 5 levels of the game against the computer.

Relax and enjoy Draughts Online wherever you are. Share Draughts with kids and show them the best entertainment from your school days.

Are you a board game enthusiast? Would you like to create or think of a strategy to win? Draughts or Checkers will help you to learn and practise logical thinking. Multiplayer Draughts mode will make the game even more fun!

With our app you can:
- Play Draughts for free
- Challenge yourself to 5 different difficulty levels
- Enjoy Draughts Online with multiplayer mode and play against random players according to the rules you like the most!
- Play Draughts offline with friends and family
- Use Hints and Undo moves
- Choose from a variety of boards and piece styles
- Personalize your user profile in Draughts online

Draughts Online no registration


Play Draughts Online with other users in just three steps:
1. Create a profile by choosing an avatar, flag of your country and entering your nickname.
2. Choose the rules you want to play.
3. Start playing and enjoy the Draughts Game.
Compare yourself to other users in multiplayer mode, improve your skills and collect gold!



5 different levels of difficulty


Let's start from the easiest level and check if you can win against the computer. The more experienced you are, the more likely you are to beat our Draughts Master. Take up the Draughts challenge and go through all 5 levels!

Draughts or Checkers variants and rules: online multiplayer and offline mode


There are many ways to play Draughts (Checkers). Everyone has various habits and usually prefers to play exactly the same way as used to play Draughts in the past, that is why decide on your favourite rules of this game:

English Draughts or American Checkers🇺🇸 or 🇬🇧

Capturing is mandatory, but the pieces cannot capture backwards. The king can only move one square and can move and capture backwards.

International Draughts

Capturing is mandatory and all the pieces can capture backwards. The queen (king) has long moves which means that, if the square is not blocked, the queen can move any distance diagonally.

Spanish Draughts: Damas 🇪🇸

Known as Spanish Checkers, based on the international rules, but the pieces cannot capture backwards.

Turkish Draughts: Dama 🇹🇷

Named also Turkish Checkers. Dark as well as light squares of the checkerboard are used. Pieces start on the second and third rows of a game board, they do not move diagonally but forward and sideways. The way that the kings (queens) move is similar to the chess queens.

Play Draughts and Checkers the way you like the most


You can change game settings and choose your own Draughts app rules e.g. to capture backwards or to choose mandatory capture.

Play Draughts online, offline with friends or face 5 levels of the game against the computer.
Have a good game!
Best regards,
Chess & Draughts Team

Are you a board game enthusiast? Would you like to create or think of a strategy to win? Draughts or Checkers will help you to learn and practise logical thinking. Multiplayer Draughts mode will make the game even more fun!

With our app you can:
- Play Draughts for free
- Challenge yourself to 5 different difficulty levels
- Enjoy Draughts Online with multiplayer mode and play against random players according to the rules you like the most!
- Play Draughts offline with friends and family
- Use Hints and Undo moves
- Choose from a variety of boards and piece styles
- Personalize your user profile in Draughts online

Draughts Online no registration


Play Draughts Online with other users in just three steps:
1. Create a profile by choosing an avatar, flag of your country and entering your nickname.
2. Choose the rules you want to play.
3. Start playing and enjoy the Draughts Game.
Compare yourself to other users in multiplayer mode, improve your skills and collect gold!



5 different levels of difficulty


Let's start from the easiest level and check if you can win against the computer. The more experienced you are, the more likely you are to beat our Draughts Master. Take up the Draughts challenge and go through all 5 levels!

Draughts or Checkers variants and rules: online multiplayer and offline mode


There are many ways to play Draughts (Checkers). Everyone has various habits and usually prefers to play exactly the same way as used to play Draughts in the past, that is why decide on your favourite rules of this game:

English Draughts or American Checkers🇺🇸 or 🇬🇧

Capturing is mandatory, but the pieces cannot capture backwards. The king can only move one square and can move and capture backwards.

International Draughts

Capturing is mandatory and all the pieces can capture backwards. The queen (king) has long moves which means that, if the square is not blocked, the queen can move any distance diagonally.

Spanish Draughts: Damas 🇪🇸

Known as Spanish Checkers, based on the international rules, but the pieces cannot capture backwards.

Turkish Draughts: Dama 🇹🇷

Named also Turkish Checkers. Dark as well as light squares of the checkerboard are used. Pieces start on the second and third rows of a game board, they do not move diagonally but forward and sideways. The way that the kings (queens) move is similar to the chess queens.

Play Draughts and Checkers the way you like the most


You can change game settings and choose your own Draughts app rules e.g. to capture backwards or to choose mandatory capture.

Play Draughts online, offline with friends or face 5 levels of the game against the computer.
Have a good game!
Best regards,
Chess & Draughts Team

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/CheckersForAndroid/

Are you a board game enthusiast? Would you like to create or think of a strategy to win? Draughts or Checkers will help you to learn and practise logical thinking. Multiplayer Draughts mode will make the game even more fun!

With our app you can:
- Play Draughts for free
- Challenge yourself to 5 different difficulty levels
- Enjoy Draughts Online with multiplayer mode and play against random players according to the rules you like the most!
- Play Draughts offline with friends and family
- Use Hints and Undo moves
- Choose from a variety of boards and piece styles
- Personalize your user profile in Draughts online

Draughts Online no registration


Play Draughts Online with other users in just three steps:
1. Create a profile by choosing an avatar, flag of your country and entering your nickname.
2. Choose the rules you want to play.
3. Start playing and enjoy the Draughts Game.
Compare yourself to other users in multiplayer mode, improve your skills and collect gold!



5 different levels of difficulty


Let's start from the easiest level and check if you can win against the computer. The more experienced you are, the more likely you are to beat our Draughts Master. Take up the Draughts challenge and go through all 5 levels!

Draughts or Checkers variants and rules: online multiplayer and offline mode


There are many ways to play Draughts (Checkers). Everyone has various habits and usually prefers to play exactly the same way as used to play Draughts in the past, that is why decide on your favourite rules of this game:

English Draughts or American Checkers🇺🇸 or 🇬🇧

Capturing is mandatory, but the pieces cannot capture backwards. The king can only move one square and can move and capture backwards.

International Draughts

Capturing is mandatory and all the pieces can capture backwards. The queen (king) has long moves which means that, if the square is not blocked, the queen can move any distance diagonally.

Spanish Draughts: Damas 🇪🇸

Known as Spanish Checkers, based on the international rules, but the pieces cannot capture backwards.

Turkish Draughts: Dama 🇹🇷

Named also Turkish Checkers. Dark as well as light squares of the checkerboard are used. Pieces start on the second and third rows of a game board, they do not move diagonally but forward and sideways. The way that the kings (queens) move is similar to the chess queens.

Play Draughts and Checkers the way you like the most


You can change game settings and choose your own Draughts app rules e.g. to capture backwards or to choose mandatory capture.

Play Draughts online, offline with friends or face 5 levels of the game against the computer.
Have a good game!
Best regards,
Chess & Draughts Team

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/CheckersForAndroid/

Are you a board game enthusiast? Would you like to create or think of a strategy to win? Draughts or Checkers will help you to learn and practice logical thinking. Multiplayer Draughts mode will make the game even more fun!

With our app you can:
- Play Draughts for free
- Challenge yourself to 5 different difficulty levels
- Enjoy Draughts Online with multiplayer mode and play against random players according to the rules you like the most!
- Play Draughts online with Blitz mode
- Play Draughts offline with friends and family
- Use Hints and Undo moves
- Choose from a variety of boards and piece styles
- Personalise your user profile in Draughts online

Draughts Online no registration


Play Draughts Online with other users in just three steps:
1. Create a profile by choosing an avatar, flag of your country and entering your nickname.
2. Choose the rules you want to play.
3. Start playing and enjoy the Draughts Game.
Compare yourself to other users in multiplayer mode, improve your skills and collect gold!

Blitz mode - perfect for a break


How to play the new blitz mode? Tap ‘’Online game’’, find the Blitz mode with a time control of 3 minutes + 2 seconds for each move, and play! This Draughts mode is faster, more dynamic, and really exciting to play. You will have the most delicious fun and a better experience!


5 different levels of difficulty


Let's start from the easiest level and check if you can win against the computer. The more experienced you are, the more likely you are to beat our Draughts Master. Take up the Draughts challenge and go through all 5 levels!

Draughts or Checkers variants and rules: online multiplayer and offline mode


There are many ways to play Draughts (Checkers). Everyone has various habits and usually prefers to play exactly the same way as used to play Draughts in the past, that is why decide on your favorite rules of this game:

English Draughts or American Checkers

Capturing is mandatory, but the pieces cannot capture backward. The king can only move one square and can move and capture backward.

International Draughts

Capturing is mandatory and all the pieces can capture backward. The queen (king) has long moves which means that, if the square is not blocked, the queen can move any distance diagonally.

Spanish Draughts: Damas

Known as Spanish Checkers, based on the international rules, but the pieces cannot capture backward.

Turkish Draughts: Dama

Named also Turkish Checkers. Dark as well as light squares of the checkerboard are used. Pieces start on the second and third rows of a game board, they do not move diagonally but forward and sideways. The way that the kings (queens) move is similar to the chess queens.

Play Checkers and Draughts the way you like the most


You can change game settings and choose your own Draughts app rules e.g. to capture backward or to choose mandatory capture.

Play draughts online, offline with friends or face 5 levels of the game against the computer.
Have a good game!
Best regards,
Chess & Checkers Team

Do you remember this board game from your childhood?


Draughts (Checkers) – a traditional and inspiring board game which gives you a lot of fun challenging the computer, playing online multiplayer mode with people from all around the world or with a friend offline. Relax and enjoy Draughts Online wherever you are. Share Draughts with kids and show them the best entertainment from your school days.

Are you a board game enthusiast? Would you like to create or think of a strategy to win? Draughts or Checkers will help you to learn and practice logical thinking. Multiplayer Draughts mode will make the game even more fun!

With our app you can:
- Play Draughts for free
- Challenge yourself to 5 different difficulty levels
- Enjoy Draughts Online with multiplayer mode and play against random players according to the rules you like the most!
- Play Draughts online with Blitz mode
- Play Draughts offline with friends and family
- Use Hints and Undo moves
- Choose from a variety of boards and piece styles
- Personalise your user profile in Draughts online

Draughts Online no registration


Play Draughts Online with other users in just three steps:
1. Create a profile by choosing an avatar, flag of your country and entering your nickname.
2. Choose the rules you want to play.
3. Start playing and enjoy the Draughts Game.
Compare yourself to other users in multiplayer mode, improve your skills and collect gold!

Blitz mode - perfect for a break


How to play the new blitz mode? Tap ‘’Online game’’, find the Blitz mode with a time control of 3 minutes + 2 seconds for each move, and play! This Draughts mode is faster, more dynamic, and really exciting to play. You will have the most delicious fun and a better experience!


5 different levels of difficulty


Let's start from the easiest level and check if you can win against the computer. The more experienced you are, the more likely you are to beat our Draughts Master. Take up the Draughts challenge and go through all 5 levels!

Draughts or Checkers variants and rules: online multiplayer and offline mode


There are many ways to play Draughts (Checkers). Everyone has various habits and usually prefers to play exactly the same way as used to play Draughts in the past, that is why decide on your favorite rules of this game:

English Draughts or American Checkers

Capturing is mandatory, but the pieces cannot capture backward. The king can only move one square and can move and capture backward.

International Draughts

Capturing is mandatory and all the pieces can capture backward. The queen (king) has long moves which means that, if the square is not blocked, the queen can move any distance diagonally.

Spanish Draughts: Damas

Known as Spanish Checkers, based on the international rules, but the pieces cannot capture backward.

Turkish Draughts: Dama

Named also Turkish Checkers. Dark as well as light squares of the checkerboard are used. Pieces start on the second and third rows of a game board, they do not move diagonally but forward and sideways. The way that the kings (queens) move is similar to the chess queens.

Play Checkers and Draughts the way you like the most


You can change game settings and choose your own Draughts app rules e.g. to capture backward or to choose mandatory capture.

Play draughts online, offline with friends or face 5 levels of the game against the computer.
Have a good game!
Best regards,
Chess & Checkers Team

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DraughtsForAndroid/
descriptionShort: Draughts - the game from your childhood, now available online with leaderboards.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
💡 NEW GAME, NEW DAY, NEW ERA! 💡
📣We are extremely happy to announce that from today you can relish the newest version of the online game - BLITZ GAME!🚀
What makes BLITZ stand out?
⏱️ the specified time for the entire game
💨 brisk game pace
📜 new rules
🔝 better experience
🤩 the most delicious fun!
Take up the challenge and bring your gameplay to the next level! 🆙💓

⬆️It's all about progress!⬆️

descriptionHtml:
Do you remember this board game from your childhood?


Draughts (Checkers) – a traditional and inspiring board game which gives you a lot of fun challenging the computer, playing online multiplayer mode with people from all around the world or with a friend offline. Relax and enjoy Draughts Online wherever you are. Share Draughts with kids and show them the best entertainment from your school days.

Are you a board game enthusiast? Would you like to create or think of a strategy to win? Draughts or Checkers will help you to learn and practice logical thinking. Multiplayer Draughts mode will make the game even more fun!

With our app you can:
- Play Draughts for free
- Challenge yourself to 5 different difficulty levels
- Enjoy Draughts Online with multiplayer mode and play against random players according to the rules you like the most!
- Play Draughts online with Blitz mode
- Play Draughts offline with friends and family
- Use Hints and Undo moves
- Choose from a variety of boards and piece styles
- Personalise your user profile in Draughts online

Draughts Online no registration


Play Draughts Online with other users in just three steps:
1. Create a profile by choosing an avatar, flag of your country and entering your nickname.
2. Choose the rules you want to play.
3. Start playing and enjoy the Draughts Game.
Compare yourself to other users in multiplayer mode, improve your skills and collect gold!

Blitz mode - perfect for a break


How to play the new blitz mode? Tap ‘’Online game’’, find the Blitz mode with a time control of 3 minutes + 2 seconds for each move, and play! This Draughts mode is faster, more dynamic, and really exciting to play. You will have the most delicious fun and a better experience!


5 different levels of difficulty


Let's start from the easiest level and check if you can win against the computer. The more experienced you are, the more likely you are to beat our Draughts Master. Take up the Draughts challenge and go through all 5 levels!

Draughts or Checkers variants and rules: online multiplayer and offline mode


There are many ways to play Draughts (Checkers). Everyone has various habits and usually prefers to play exactly the same way as used to play Draughts in the past, that is why decide on your favorite rules of this game:

English Draughts or American Checkers

Capturing is mandatory, but the pieces cannot capture backward. The king can only move one square and can move and capture backward.

International Draughts

Capturing is mandatory and all the pieces can capture backward. The queen (king) has long moves which means that, if the square is not blocked, the queen can move any distance diagonally.

Spanish Draughts: Damas

Known as Spanish Checkers, based on the international rules, but the pieces cannot capture backward.

Turkish Draughts: Dama

Named also Turkish Checkers. Dark as well as light squares of the checkerboard are used. Pieces start on the second and third rows of a game board, they do not move diagonally but forward and sideways. The way that the kings (queens) move is similar to the chess queens.

Play Checkers and Draughts the way you like the most


You can change game settings and choose your own Draughts app rules e.g. to capture backward or to choose mandatory capture.

Play draughts online, offline with friends or face 5 levels of the game against the computer.
Have a good game!
Best regards,
Chess & Checkers Team

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DraughtsForAndroid/
descriptionShort: Draughts - the game from your childhood, now available online with leaderboards.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
"🏆 TOURNAMENTS 🏆 from Tuesday to Saturday 📅🤩

📈 Aim high! Win as many matches as possible and earn points.👑
🎁 The more points, the more generous the prizes! 🎁
🙄 No wins? Don't worry, and keep your chin up!! Losses are lessons. 💪
💰 You can always count on a consolation prize. 💰
🍀🤞 Do your best, and may luck be in your favor! 🤞🍀"

title: Draughts

creator: CC  Games
descriptionHtml:
Do you remember this board game from your childhood?


Draughts (Checkers) – a traditional and inspiring board game which gives you a lot of fun challenging the computer, playing online multiplayer mode with people from all around the world or with a friend offline. Relax and enjoy Draughts Online wherever you are. Share Draughts with kids and show them the best entertainment from your school days.

Are you a board game enthusiast? Would you like to create or think of a strategy to win? Draughts or Checkers will help you to learn and practice logical thinking. Multiplayer Draughts mode will make the game even more fun!

With our app you can:
- Play Draughts for free
- Challenge yourself to 5 different difficulty levels
- Enjoy Draughts Online with multiplayer mode and play against random players according to the rules you like the most!
- Play Draughts online with Blitz mode
- Play Draughts offline with friends and family
- Use Hints and Undo moves
- Choose from a variety of boards and piece styles
- Personalise your user profile in Draughts online

Draughts Online no registration


Play Draughts Online with other users in just three steps:
1. Create a profile by choosing an avatar, flag of your country and entering your nickname.
2. Choose the rules you want to play.
3. Start playing and enjoy the Draughts Game.
Compare yourself to other users in multiplayer mode, improve your skills and collect gold!

Blitz mode - perfect for a break


How to play the new blitz mode? Tap ‘’Online game’’, find the Blitz mode with a time control of 3 minutes + 2 seconds for each move, and play! This Draughts mode is faster, more dynamic, and really exciting to play. You will have the most delicious fun and a better experience!


5 different levels of difficulty


Let's start from the easiest level and check if you can win against the computer. The more experienced you are, the more likely you are to beat our Draughts Master. Take up the Draughts challenge and go through all 5 levels!

Draughts or Checkers variants and rules: online multiplayer and offline mode


There are many ways to play Draughts (Checkers). Everyone has various habits and usually prefers to play exactly the same way as used to play Draughts in the past, that is why decide on your favorite rules of this game:

English Draughts or American Checkers

Capturing is mandatory, but the pieces cannot capture backward. The king can only move one square and can move and capture backward.

International Draughts

Capturing is mandatory and all the pieces can capture backward. The queen (king) has long moves which means that, if the square is not blocked, the queen can move any distance diagonally.

Spanish Draughts: Damas

Known as Spanish Checkers, based on the international rules, but the pieces cannot capture backward.

Turkish Draughts: Dama

Named also Turkish Checkers. Dark as well as light squares of the checkerboard are used. Pieces start on the second and third rows of a game board, they do not move diagonally but forward and sideways. The way that the kings (queens) move is similar to the chess queens.

Play Checkers and Draughts the way you like the most


You can change game settings and choose your own Draughts app rules e.g. to capture backward or to choose mandatory capture.

Play draughts online, offline with friends or face 5 levels of the game against the computer.
Have a good game!
Best regards,
Chess & Checkers Team

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DraughtsForAndroid/

You can change game settings and choose your own Checkers app rules e.g. to capture backward or to choose mandatory capture.

Play checkers online, offline with friends or face 5 levels of the game against the computer.
Have a good game!
Best regards,
Chess & Checkers Team

title:
Checkers Online
2.35.1

creator: CC  Games
descriptionHtml:
Do you remember this board game from your childhood?


Checkers (Draughts) – a traditional and inspiring board game that gives you a lot of fun challenging the computer, playing online multiplayer mode with people from all around the world or with a friend offline. Relax and enjoy Checkers Online wherever you are.

Checkers or Draughts will help you to learn and practice logical thinking. Multiplayer checkers mode will make the strategic game even more fun!

In our app, you can find the following:
- Checkers for free
- 5 difficulty levels
- Checkers Online with multiplayer mode
- Checkers online with Blitz mode
- Checkers offline with a friend
- Hints and Undo moves
- Variety of boards and piece styles
- User profile in Checkers online

Checkers Online no registration


Play Checkers Online with other users in just three steps:
1. Create a profile by choosing an avatar, the flag of your country and entering your nickname.
2. Choose the rules you want to play.
3. Start playing and enjoy the Checkers Game.
Compare yourself to other users in multiplayer mode, improve your skills and collect gold!

Blitz mode - perfect for a break


How to play the new blitz mode? Tap ‘’Online game’’, find the Blitz mode with a time control of 3 minutes + 2 seconds for each move, and play! This draughts mode is faster, more dynamic, and exciting to play.

Tournaments


Try your hand at Blitz ARENA tournaments!
Sign up for tournaments in advance by clicking the ''Join'' button, and when the tournament starts, tap ''Play'' and compete!
All you have to do is to win as many games as possible and grab royal prizes! You will find your results in the leaderboard of the ongoing tournament and the monthly Arena Championship. Top players can expect something unique!

5 different levels of difficulty


Let's start from the easiest level and check if you can win against the computer. The more experienced you are, the more likely you are to beat our Checkers Master. Take up the Checkers challenge and go through all 5 levels!

Checkers or Draughts variants and rules: online multiplayer and offline mode


There are many ways to play Checkers (Draughts). Everyone has various habits and usually prefers to play exactly the same way as they used to play Checkers in the past. That is why decide on your favorite rules of this game:

American Checkers 🇺🇸 or English Draughts 🇬🇧

Capturing is mandatory, but the pieces cannot capture backward. The king can only move one square and can move and capture backward.

International Draughts

Capturing is mandatory and all the pieces can capture backward. The queen (king) has long moves which means that, if the square is not blocked, the queen can move any distance diagonally.

Spanish Checkers: Damas 🇪🇸

Known as Spanish Draughts, based on international rules, but the pieces cannot capture backward.

Turkish Checkers: Dama 🇹🇷

Named also Turkish Draughts. The game is played on both light and dark squares of the checkerboard. Pieces start on the second and third rows of a game board. They do not move diagonally but forward and sideways. The way that the kings (queens) move is similar to the chess queens.

Play Checkers and Draughts the way you like the most


You can change game settings and choose your own Checkers app rules e.g. backward capture or mandatory capture.

Play Checkers online, offline with friends or face 5 levels of the game against the computer.

Have a good game!

Best regards,
CC Games Team

Named also Turkish Draughts. The game is played on both light and dark squares of the checkerboard. Pieces start on the second and third rows of a game board.They do not move diagonally but forward and sideways. The way that the kings (queens) move is similar to the chess queens.

Play Draughts and Checkers the way you like the most


You can change game settings and choose your own Draughts app rules, e.g., backward capture or mandatory capture.

Play Draughts online, offline with friends, or face 5 levels of the game against the computer.

Have a good game!

Best regards,
CC Games Team

Known as Spanish Draughts, based on international rules, but the pieces cannot capture backward.

Turkish Draughts: Dama 🇹🇷

Named also Turkish Draughts. The game is played on both light and dark squares of the checkerboard. Pieces start on the second and third rows of a game board.They do not move diagonally but forward and sideways. The way that the kings (queens) move is similar to the chess queens.

Play Draughts and Checkers the way you like the most


You can change game settings and choose your own Draughts app rules, e.g., backward capture or mandatory capture.

Play Draughts online, offline with friends, or face 5 levels of the game against the computer.

Have a good game!

Best regards,
CC Games Team
